CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 22, 1940, pg. 8, reads: "The Bride And Groom...After The Ceremony - Comfortably seated in their car are the newlyweds, Mr. and Mrs. Samuel Eugene Lyon, snapped by Courier cameraman after the ceremony uniting them was held Sunday afternoon in Ethnan Temple Seventh Day Adventist church in Pittsburgh. The bride was the former Miss Fannie Cherry, daughter of Fr. and Mrs. S. O. Cherry of Pittsburgh.  The couple will live in Washington where the groom is employed with the government.-Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Groom Samuel Eugene Lyon and bride Fannie Cherry Lyon seated in back of car
